trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ExtendedDNControl"></xref> class requests an extended form of the distinguished name of an Active Directory Domain Services object.

The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ExtendedDNControl.#ctor"></xref> constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ExtendedDNControl"></xref> class.

The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ExtendedDNControl.#ctor(System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ExtendedDNFlag)"></xref> constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ExtendedDNControl"></xref> class using the specified flag.
A value of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ExtendedDNFlag"></xref> enumeration that specifies the format of the extended distinguished name.

The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ExtendedDNControl.Flag"></xref> property contains one of the values of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ExtendedDNFlag"></xref> that specifies the format of the extended distinguished name.
One of the values of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ExtendedDNFlag"></xref> that specifies the format of the extended distinguished name.
The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.ExtendedDNControl.GetValue"></xref> method returns the format of the extended distinguished name.
The format of the extended distinguished name.
